title: User can view existing tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to a Pro Player Profile
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the tx
AND clicks 'close'
custom_expected:
THEN tx opens
AND follow wireframe and DD
AND returns user to point of entry
AND follows global AC

title: BOC can Create New tx from Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a Pro Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'create new'>tx>Major>Inactive List>Place on Bereavement/Family Medical Emergency
custom_expected:
THEN tx opens
IF preliminary tx already exists with 10 days
THEN existing tx opens
AND tx follows wireframe and DD

title: User can Delete tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to a preliminary/rejected tx
AND has permissions
custom_expected:
THEN confirmation message opens
IF 'yes'
THEN tx deletes w/blue notification and returns user to point of entry
IF 'no'
THEN no action taken

title: User receives error if back/futuredated tx more than 2 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has opened the tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the user sets the assignment date to 2 days before or after current date
AND clicks approve
custom_expected: THEN show error (ignore and continue BOC only)

title: User receives error if Player has Pending/Approved tx after assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a pending/approved tx AFTER assignment date
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: BOC can Approve tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in a preliminary tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful notification appears
AND Update Player's Player History: Code = BEREV , Description = Placed on Major League Bereavement/Family Medical Emergency List , From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font. 
AND Update player's MJ Roster Status to "Bereavement List"
AND Add transaction to the Daily Transaction Bulletin. "Place on Bereavement List"

title: Club views tx as greyed out in Create New map from Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a pro player profile
custom_steps: WHEN user views Create New>Transaction>Major>Inactive List
custom_expected: THEN Place on Bereavement/Family Medical Emergency should be greyed out

title: BOC can Reverse tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in an approved tx
custom_expected:
THEN tx is reversed
AND successful notification appears
AND status is updated in tx and player history
AND player's pending status is reversed
IF the player has an outstanding tx then show error

title: BOC can Reverse and Suppress tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in an approved tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks reverse and suppress
custom_expected:
THEN tx is reversed then suppressed
AND successful notification appears
AND status is updated in tx and player history
AND player's pending status is reversed
AND tx is hidden in the UI
IF the player has an outstanding tx then show error

title: BOC can Suppress tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in a reversed tx
custom_expected:
THEN tx is suppressed
AND removed from Player History
AND hidden in the UI

title: BOC receives error approving tx after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user in the tx
AND has set the assignment date after the current date
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: BOC receives error approving tx for Player w/prior pending tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a player with a prior pending tx
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Club receives notification when tx is Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC has approved the tx
custom_expected:
THEN item appears in notifications
AND hyperlinks work

title: Club receives notification when tx is Reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC has reversed a tx
custom_steps: WHEN the club views the clipboard
custom_expected: THEN notification item appears

title: User receives error creating tx for Player not in Majors
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user creates tx for major league player
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND rule checks on approve

title: User receives error creating tx for invalid MJ Roster status Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user creates tx for player w/pending or active or pending active MJ roster status, or DL placement (including rehab)
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND rule runs on approve

title: User receives error if stats are found on or after tx date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has created a tx
AND has entered a tx date
AND the player has stats entered after assignment date
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND BOC only can ignore and continue

title: User can Edit existing tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a tx
custom_expected:
THEN form reloads in edit mode
AND save button replaces the edit button
AND users' permissions follow that of the story

title: User can Save tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is editing the tx
custom_expected:
THEN successful notification appears
AND form reloads in view mode
IF first time form is saved THEN status changes to preliminary

title: User can Cancel tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing the tx
custom_expected:
THEN show confirmation message
IF yes, user is returned to point of entry
IF no, no action taken
IF saved, no changes made
IF not saved, no record kept

title: BOC- Admin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC admin
AND is in the tx
custom_expected:
THEN Can view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND Can view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
AND Can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players. 
AND Can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags.

title: BOC- Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in as BOC basic
AND is viewing the tx
custom_expected:
THEN Can view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players but cannot make any changes or e-sign.
AND Can view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.

title: Club- Admin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in as a club admin
AND is viewing the tx
custom_expected:
THEN can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transactions. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.
 
      However, there are exceptions:
      1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
      2. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field

AND Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
 
      1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
      2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
      3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
 
AND Can NOT create, delete, submit, edit, or attach files to any BOC only Major League transactions for Major League players.

title: Club- Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as basic club
AND is viewing the tx
custom_expected:
THEN can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.

          However, there are exceptions:
                  1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
                  2. They cannot edit or change these transactions (Basic only)
                  3. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field
 
AND Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
 
    1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
    2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
    3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User can view existing tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to a Pro Player Profile
AND that player has a Paternity leave tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN tx opens
AND user can close tx

title: BOC can Create New tx from Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a Pro Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Create New>Transaction>Major>Inactive List>Major League Paternity List
custom_expected:
THEN tx opens in edit mode
IF tx already exists in past 10 days THEN existing tx opens
AND tx follows wireframe and DD

title: User can Delete tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in the tx
AND has permissions
AND is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN confirmation message appears
IF yes THEN tx is deleted and no record kept 
AND successful notification appears
AND user is taken to point of entry
IF no THEN no action taken

title: User receives error if back/futuredated tx more than 2 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has dated the tx more than 2 days from the current date
custom_expected: THEN show error (ignore and continue BOC only)

title: User receives error if Player has Pending/Approved tx after assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a tx for a player w/pending or approved tx after assignment date
custom_expected: THEN show error (ignore and continue BOC only)

title: BOC can Approve tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in the tx w/out errors
custom_expected:
THEN tx status changes to approved
AND blue successful notification displays
AND player's history/status updates
AND tx displays in bulletin

title: BOC can Reverse tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an approved tx
custom_expected:
THEN tx is reversed
AND blue notification displays
AND Player history/status updates

title: BOC can Reverse and Suppress tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an approved tx
AND its the players latest tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects reverse and suppress
custom_expected:
THEN tx is first reversed then suppressed
AND tx/player status/history updates
AND tx is hidden in the system
AND blue notification displays

title: BOC can Suppress tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a reversed tx
custom_expected:
THEN show blue notification
AND tx is hidden

title: BOC receives error approving tx for Player w/prior pending tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a tx for a player w/pending prior tx
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: BOC receives error approving tx after current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a tx w/assignment date AFTER current date
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: User receives error creating tx for Player not in Majors
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating new tx for minor league player
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the tx
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Club receives notification when tx is Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC has approved the tx
custom_steps: WHEN the club views their notifications
custom_expected:
THEN tx appears
AND links work

title: Club receives notification when tx is Reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC has reversed a tx
custom_steps: WHEN the club views their notifications
custom_expected:
THEN tx appears
AND links work

title: User receives error if stats are found on or after tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a tx for a player w/stats on or after assignment date
custom_expected: THEN show error (ignore and continue BOC only)

title: User receives error creating tx for invalid MJ Roster status Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a tx for an inactive player
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the tx
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Club views tx as greyed out in Create New map from Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club has navigated to the tx
custom_steps: WHEN the club tries to create the tx
custom_expected: THEN tx is greyed out

title: User can Edit existing tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the tx
custom_expected:
THEN for reloads in view mode
AND edit button is replaced with save button
AND preliminary forms have all editable fields
AND clubs CANNOT edit
AND BOC can only edit files/comment for approved/reversed

title: User can Save tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN all changes are saved
AND blue notification displays
AND for reloads in view mode
AND tx status updates to preliminary

title: User can Cancel tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in a tx
custom_expected:
THEN show confirmation message
IF in view mode THEN user returns to point of entry
IF in edit mode THEN no changes saved
